Package org.palladiosimulator.analyzer.slingshot.simulation.engine

Interface SimulationEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimulationEngineSSJ
    public interface SimulationEngine
    The engine handles the simulation and schedules the next events.
    Author:
    Julijan Katic

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus getEventDispatcher()
      Returns the event bus.
      double getTime()
      Returns the simulated time.
      boolean hasScheduledEvents()
      Checks whether it has any scheduled events left.
      void init()
      Initializes the simulation engine.
      void scheduleEvent​(DESEvent event)
      Schedules the next event and publishes it to the EventBus.
      void scheduleEvent​(DESEvent event, double delay)
      Publishes an event to the EventBus with a certain delay.
      void start()
      Starts the simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initializes the simulation engine.

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the simulation.

      • scheduleEvent

        void scheduleEvent​(DESEvent event)
        Schedules the next event and publishes it to the EventBus.
        Parameters:
        event - the non-null event.

      • scheduleEvent

        void scheduleEvent​(DESEvent event,
                   double delay)
        Publishes an event to the EventBus with a certain delay.
        Parameters:
        event - The non-null event.
        delay - The non-negative delay.

      • getTime

        double getTime()
        Returns the simulated time.
        Returns:
        The current simulation time.

      • hasScheduledEvents

        boolean hasScheduledEvents()
        Checks whether it has any scheduled events left.
        Returns:
        true iff it has scheduled events.

      • getEventDispatcher

        com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus getEventDispatcher()
        Returns the event bus.
